services.heading: We offer a range of services to help you grow your project

content.description: Influencer campaigns with over 1000 popular names from the space, featuring carefully prepared strategies and timely execution.
By having access to all top-tier communities within web3, thoroughly planned and conducted partnership activites.
Growing your socials including Discord, Telegram and Twitter while helping you to manage them.
Top-quality insights and strategies by people with expertise in Web3 marketing to help your brand achieve its full potantial.

items.name: MemeFi
items.description: My partnership with MemeFi in their SocialFi Campaign propelled their success to new heights. I was responsible for their content marketing and helping with their new Game-Fi experience.

items.name: Lingocoins
items.description: My partnership with Lingo Coin in their SocialFi Campaign propelled their success to new heights. I was responsible for their content marketing and helping with their new gamified SocialFi experience.

items.name: Atleta Network
items.description: I led a KOL marketing campaign in with Turkish KOLs, significantly increasing our reach by onboarding thousands and leveraging local influencers to educate our target audience. This strategic initiative greatly enhanced our market presence and influence.

items.name: AiMonica Brands
items.description: My partnership with AiMonica Brands in their Memecoin Campaign propelled their success to new heights. I was responsible for KOLs' tweets.

items.name: Tea Coin
items.description: Successfully led a last-minute KOL campaign to recover from a previously failed effort. By swiftly coordinating with relevant KOLs and providing them with accurate briefs, they effectively communicated with their communities, resulting in a significant increase in pre-sale participants for the project.
